parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the light. Use empty value for automatic discovery.

parameter.name: fadetime
parameter.label: Fade time
parameter.description: The time to fade to the new color value (in ms).

parameter.name: powerOnBrightness
parameter.label: Power on brightness
parameter.description: Brightness level used when switching on the light. Use empty value to leave brightness as is.

parameter.name: powerOnBrightness
parameter.label: Power on brightness
parameter.description: Brightness level used when switching on the light. Use empty value to leave brightness as is.

parameter.name: powerOnColor
parameter.label: Power on Color
parameter.description: Comma separated Hue (0-360), saturation (0-100) and brightness (0-100) levels used when switching on the light. Use empty value to leave it as is.

parameter.name: powerOnTemperature
parameter.label: Power on temperature
parameter.description: Color temperature level used when switching on the light. Use empty value to leave color temperature as is.
